name: Break Out (Lumimon)
description:
You wake up trapped, alone and cold. You're in a room with only darkness. Every thing is backwards nothing is right but nothing is wrong.

The world doesn't work the same here.. not to mention you dont have many memories...however after your 'challenge' you meet up with 7 boys who you're sure you knew before.... 

With a voice 'guiding' you all the situation becomes more complicated so to simplify it your new motto is:

The problem is your trapped. The solution? Break out
